title: A Magnet For Blessings | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: A Magnet For Blessings | Joel Osteen
description:
When you make honoring God your highest priority, He will pour out a commanded blessing over your life. You don't have to chase HIs favor. When you focus on seeking God, He will cause the blessings to overtake you. 



Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
